title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 68.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 68.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Subdivision 36 of section
375
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law adopts the slow-moving vehicle emblem described in

American Society of Agricultural Engineers standard S276.2 as the official
slow-moving vehicle emblem of New York State. The Commissioner of Motor

Vehicles is authorized to and shall establish specifications and standards
applicable to the size, design and use of said emblem. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
68.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
